description:
One Move, 11 Choices, Different Possibilities...

You are stuck in a room and you don't know what happened...

NOW IT'S UP TO YOU HOW YOU WOULD ESCAPE...

Inspired by Sam Barlow's Aisle that defies the "One-Move Genre", Select One Choice and see what will happen...

Escape Now...

_____________________________________________________________________________________________

(This Game is Created in only a Few Minutes)
